charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. 841(a)(1) and 841 (b)(1)(C) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE LESS THAN 500 GRAMS OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of seventy (70) months at each of Counts 1, 2 and 3, said terms to run concurrently w/recommendations more fully stated in Judgment; Four (4) years' Supervised Release w/standard and additional conditions; Fine waived; $300.00 Special Assessment, due immediately: For Revocation of Supervised Release on 6/16/15 , the Court imposes Judgment as follows: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of twelve (12) months and one (1) day with recommendations more fully stated in Judgment; One (1) year of Supervised Release to follow with standard and additional conditions; For revocation of Supervised Release on 6/7/17, the Court imposes a term of imprisonment of thirty-six (36) months, said term comprised of thirty-six (36) months at each of Counts 1-3 of the Indictment at CR No. 08-357, said terms to run concurrently. In addition, the Court recommends that said term of imprisonment run concurrently to any potential sentence which may be imposed by the Court of Common Pleas of Washington Count at Case # CP-63-CR003327-2016 w/other recommendation more fully stated in Judgment; No further term of Supervised Release to follow.

charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 5 GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE BASE, IN THE FORM COMMONLY KNOWN AS CRACK.(2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of seventy (70) months at each of Counts 1, 2 and 3, said terms to run concurrently w/recommendations more fully stated in Judgment; Four (4) years' Supervised Release w/standard and additional conditions; Fine waived; $300.00 Special Assessment, due immediately; For Revocation of Supervised Release on 6/16/15 , the Court imposes Judgment as follows: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of twelve (12) months and one (1) day with recommendations more fully stated in Judgment; One (1) year of Supervised Release to follow with standard and additional conditions; For revocation of Supervised Release on 6/7/17, the Court imposes a term of imprisonment of thirty-six (36) months, said term comprised of thirty-six (36) months at each of Counts 1-3 of the Indictment at CR No. 08-357, said terms to run concurrently. In addition, the Court recommends that said term of imprisonment run concurrently to any potential sentence which may be imposed by the Court of Common Pleas of Washington Count at Case # CP-63-CR003327-2016 w/other recommendation more fully stated in Judgment; No further term of Supervised Release to follow.

charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(iii) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 50 GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE BASE, IN THE FORM COMMONLY KNOWN AS CRACK.(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon Government's Oral Motion on 4/15/11.
